text: Human rights in Chad have been described as "poor". Freedom House has designated the country as "Not Free.""Chad" Country Reports on Human Rights Practices 2006. United States Department of State. Accessed on September 4, 2007.Chad (2007) Freedom House. Accessed on September 4, 2007. Chad received a score of 7 for political rights and 6 for civil liberties (with 1 being the most free, 7 being the least free). == Sexual orientation == Article 350(i) of the Penal Code provides imprisonment of ten to twenty years when the rape is committed because of the sexual orientation of the victim. == References == Chad Category:Chad
title: Human rights in Chad
